duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and maintain the QICS system infrastructure for quality reporting and support departments in usage of data.
Train and support departments in QICS maintenance and utilization of QICS data to complete PDCA on key items.
Create and maintain Reporting for Quality Plant KPI's (Key Performance Indicators) on a daily, weekly, and monthly basis.
Lead special projects as needed, such as FSI (Fundamental Structural Innovation).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or equivalent combination of education and experience (Master's preferred)
